Class OrderStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.statistics.OrderStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class OrderStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    A class representing the order statistics of the system.
    Author:
    SWOP team 10 2013-2014

    • Constructor Summary

      OrderStatistics(Subject subject)
      Creates a new order statistics object with a given subject it needs to observe.

      • OrderStatistics

        public OrderStatistics(Subject subject)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new order statistics object with a given subject it needs to observe.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject the statistics need to observe.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - | If the subject is equal to 'null' or if the subject isn't an order manager. | subject == null || !(subject instanceof OrderManager)

      • getLast

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tuple<Order,java.lang.Integer>> getLast(int number)
                                                            throws IllegalNumberException
        Returns the last 'number' orders and their delays.
        Parameters:
        number - The number of orders.
        Returns:
        The last orders (length: number) and the delays of those orders.
        Throws:
        IllegalNumberException - | If the number is smaller than zero or if the number is higher or equal than the number of finished orders. | number < 0 || number >= this.finishedOrders.size()

      • update

        public void update(Subject subject)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Observer
        This method gets called whenever the state of the subject changes. The implementer is responsible for the retrieval of the changed data.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject who requested this update.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - | If the subject is equal to 'null' or isn't an order manager | subject == null || !(subject instanceof OrderManager)
